001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.fluent;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.Storage;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.button.ButtonService;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.ButtonUiElement;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
007import io.qameta.allure.Allure;
008import org.assertj.core.api.Assertions;
009
010import static io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.storage.StorageKeysUi.UI;
011
012/**
013 * Provides a fluent API for interacting with button components.
014 *
015 * <p>This class enables structured interactions with UI buttons, including actions such as clicking,
016 * validating visibility, and checking whether a button is enabled. It integrates with {@link ButtonService}
017 * to perform UI operations efficiently.
018 *
019 * <p>The fluent API design allows method chaining to improve test readability and maintainability.
020 *
021 * @param <T> Represents the fluent UI service that extends {@link UiServiceFluent}.
022 *            This type parameter ensures that method chaining correctly returns the calling instance type.
023 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
024 */
025@SuppressWarnings({"java:S5960", "unchecked"})
026public class ButtonServiceFluent<T extends UiServiceFluent<?>> {
027
028   private final ButtonService buttonService;
029   private final T uiServiceFluent;
030   private final Storage storage;
031   private final SmartWebDriver driver;
032
033   /**
034    * Constructs an instance of {@code ButtonServiceFluent}.
035    *
036    * @param uiServiceFluent The UI service fluent instance
037    * @param storage         The storage instance for persisting test values
038    * @param buttonService   The button service instance
039    * @param webDriver       The WebDriver instance
040    */
041   public ButtonServiceFluent(T uiServiceFluent, Storage storage, ButtonService buttonService,
042                              SmartWebDriver webDriver) {
043      this.buttonService = buttonService;
044      this.uiServiceFluent = uiServiceFluent;
045      this.storage = storage;
046      driver = webDriver;
047   }
048
049   /**
050    * Clicks the specified button element.
051    *
052    * @param element The button element to click
053    * @return The fluent UI service instance
054    */
055   public T click(final ButtonUiElement element) {
056      Allure.step(String.format("[UI - Button] Clicking button with componentType: %s, locator: %s",
057            element.componentType(), element.locator()));
058      element.before().accept(driver);
059      buttonService.click(element.componentType(), element.locator());
060      element.after().accept(driver);
061      return uiServiceFluent;
062   }
063
064   /**
065    * Checks if the button is enabled.
066    *
067    * @param element The button element
068    * @return The fluent UI service instance
069    */
070   public T isEnabled(final ButtonUiElement element) {
071      Allure.step(String.format("[UI - Button] Checking if button is enabled with componentType: %s, locator: %s",
072            element.componentType(), element.locator()));
073      element.before().accept(driver);
074      boolean enabled = buttonService.isEnabled(element.componentType(), element.locator());
075      element.after().accept(driver);
076      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), enabled);
077      return uiServiceFluent;
078   }
079
080   /**
081    * Validates if the button is enabled.
082    *
083    * @param element The button element
084    * @return The fluent UI service instance
085    */
086   public T validateIsEnabled(final ButtonUiElement element) {
087      return validateIsEnabled(element, true, false);
088   }
089
090   /**
091    * Validates if the button is enabled with soft assertion.
092    *
093    * @param element The button element
094    * @param soft    Whether to perform a soft assertion
095    * @return The fluent UI service instance
096    */
097   public T validateIsEnabled(final ButtonUiElement element, boolean soft) {
098      return validateIsEnabled(element, true, soft);
099   }
100
101   private T validateIsEnabled(final ButtonUiElement element, boolean shouldBeEnabled, boolean soft) {
102      Allure.step(String.format("[UI - Button] Validating if button is enabled/disabled with componentType: %s, "
103            + "locator: %s", element.componentType(), element.locator()));
104      element.before().accept(driver);
105      boolean enabled = buttonService.isEnabled(element.componentType(), element.locator());
106      element.after().accept(driver);
107      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), enabled);
108
109      String assertionMessage = shouldBeEnabled
110            ? "Validating button is enabled"
111            : "Validating button is disabled";
112
113      if (soft) {
114         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
115               softAssertions -> {
116                  if (shouldBeEnabled) {
117                     softAssertions.assertThat(enabled).as(assertionMessage).isTrue();
118                  } else {
119                     softAssertions.assertThat(enabled).as(assertionMessage).isFalse();
120                  }
121               }
122         );
123      } else {
124         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
125               () -> {
126                  if (shouldBeEnabled) {
127                     Assertions.assertThat(enabled).as(assertionMessage).isTrue();
128                  } else {
129                     Assertions.assertThat(enabled).as(assertionMessage).isFalse();
130                  }
131               }
132         );
133      }
134   }
135
136   /**
137    * Validates if the button is disabled.
138    *
139    * @param element The button element
140    * @return The fluent UI service instance
141    */
142   public T validateIsDisabled(final ButtonUiElement element) {
143      return validateIsEnabled(element, false, false);
144   }
145
146   /**
147    * Validates if the button is disabled with soft assertion.
148    *
149    * @param element The button element
150    * @param soft    Whether to perform a soft assertion
151    * @return The fluent UI service instance
152    */
153   public T validateIsDisabled(final ButtonUiElement element, boolean soft) {
154      return validateIsEnabled(element, false, soft);
155   }
156
157   /**
158    * Checks if the button is visible.
159    *
160    * @param element The button element
161    * @return The fluent UI service instance
162    */
163   public T isVisible(final ButtonUiElement element) {
164      Allure.step(String.format("[UI - Button] Checking if button is visible with componentType: %s, locator: %s",
165            element.componentType(), element.locator()));
166      element.before().accept(driver);
167      boolean visible = buttonService.isVisible(element.componentType(), element.locator());
168      element.after().accept(driver);
169      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), visible);
170      return uiServiceFluent;
171   }
172
173   /**
174    * Validates if the button is visible.
175    *
176    * @param element The button element
177    * @return The fluent UI service instance
178    */
179   public T validateIsVisible(final ButtonUiElement element) {
180      return validateIsVisible(element, true, false);
181   }
182
183   /**
184    * Validates whether the specified button UI element is visible.
185    *
186    * @param element The {@link ButtonUiElement} to be validated.
187    * @param soft    If {@code true}, the validation will be performed as a soft assertion.
188    * @return The instance of {@link UiServiceFluent} to allow method chaining.
189    */
190   public T validateIsVisible(final ButtonUiElement element, boolean soft) {
191      Allure.step(String.format("[UI - Button] Validating if button is visible with componentType: %s, locator: %s",
192            element.componentType(), element.locator()));
193      return validateIsVisible(element, true, soft);
194   }
195
196   private T validateIsVisible(final ButtonUiElement element, boolean shouldBeVisible, boolean soft) {
197      Allure.step(String.format("[UI - Button] Validating if button is visible/hidden with componentType: %s, "
198            + "locator: %s", element.componentType(), element.locator()));
199      element.before().accept(driver);
200      boolean visible = buttonService.isVisible(element.componentType(), element.locator());
201      element.after().accept(driver);
202      storage.sub(UI).put(element.enumImpl(), visible);
203
204      String assertionMessage = shouldBeVisible
205            ? "Validating button is visible"
206            : "Validating button is hidden";
207
208      if (soft) {
209         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
210               softAssertions -> {
211                  if (shouldBeVisible) {
212                     softAssertions.assertThat(visible).as(assertionMessage).isTrue();
213                  } else {
214                     softAssertions.assertThat(visible).as(assertionMessage).isFalse();
215                  }
216               }
217         );
218      } else {
219         return (T) uiServiceFluent.validate(
220               () -> {
221                  if (shouldBeVisible) {
222                     Assertions.assertThat(visible).as(assertionMessage).isTrue();
223                  } else {
224                     Assertions.assertThat(visible).as(assertionMessage).isFalse();
225                  }
226               }
227         );
228      }
229   }
230
231   /**
232    * Validates if the button is hidden.
233    *
234    * @param element The button element
235    * @return The fluent UI service instance
236    */
237   public T validateIsHidden(final ButtonUiElement element) {
238      return validateIsVisible(element, false, false);
239   }
240
241   /**
242    * Validates whether the specified button UI element is hidden.
243    *
244    * @param element The {@link ButtonUiElement} to be validated.
245    * @param soft    If {@code true}, the validation will be performed as a soft assertion.
246    * @return The instance of {@link UiServiceFluent} to allow method chaining.
247    */
248   public T validateIsHidden(final ButtonUiElement element, boolean soft) {
249      return validateIsVisible(element, false, soft);
250   }
251}
